mapper.select: SELECT R.RCID, GTITLE, GBTITLE, R.RCINFO, M.NICKNAME, R.STMT FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.USERID=M.USERID) JOIN GBOARD USING(GBID) JOIN SGROUP USING(GID) WHERE RCTYPE=1 ORDER BY STMT, RCID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE RCTYPE=1

SELECT GTITLE, M.NICKNAME "tnickName", M.WARN_CNT, R.RCINFO, M2.NICKNAME, GBTITLE, R.RCCONTENT, RCID, GBID FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.TARGETID=M.USERID) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.USERID=M2.USERID) JOIN GBOARD USING(GBID) JOIN SGROUP USING(GID) WHERE RCID=#{rcId}

SELECT RCID, CCONTENT, M.NICKNAME "tnickName", RCINFO, M2.NICKNAME, STMT FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.TARGETID=M.USERID) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.USERID=M2.USERID) JOIN GB_COMMENT USING(CID) WHERE RCTYPE=2 ORDER BY STMT, RCID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE RCTYPE=2

SELECT GBTITLE, M.NICKNAME "tnickName", M.WARN_CNT, RCINFO, M2.NICKNAME, R.RCCONTENT, GC.CCONTENT, RCID, CID FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.TARGETID=M.USERID) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.USERID=M2.USERID) JOIN GB_COMMENT GC USING(CID) JOIN GBOARD G ON(R.GBID = G.GBID) JOIN SGROUP S ON(G.GID=S.GID) WHERE RCID=#{rcId}
